Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides a tax credit for farmers who use qualified biodiesel fuel for the sole operation of their farm equipment
Summary: Provides a tax credit for farmers who use qualified biodiesel fuel for the sole operation of their farm equipment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a tax credit to farmers who purchase biodiesel fuel for the operation of their farm equipment
